document_data.name: Alin Cateln
document_data.mainbody: '''Alin Cateln''' was a human bard and a brief member of the adventuring group, the [[Moor Runners]].
document_data.Description: Alin wore a light tunic, an indigo-dyed vest and leather [[breeches]].He carried and played a [[harp]], and used a [[rapier]].
document_data.Personality: Alin always had to sing for his supper, rides and things he needed. He enjoyed collecting stories.
document_data.History: Alin was originally from [[Tilverton]] and was sent away by his father for failing at an academy in [[Cormyr]].
